thread.title: Acumentrics SOFC Corporation Names Michael J. Gagnon Vice President of Sales and Marketing
thread.title_full: Acumentrics SOFC Corporation Names Michael J. Gagnon Vice President of Sales and Marketing

author: admin
title: Acumentrics SOFC Corporation Names Michael J. Gagnon Vice President of Sales and Marketing
text:
Acumentrics SOFC Corporation 
WESTWOOD, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Acumentrics SOFC Corporation announced today that Michael J. Gagnon has been appointed as its new Vice President of Sales and Marketing. 
Mr. Gagnon has a distinguished career in sales and marketing in a number of high tech companies in New England, leading teams to achieve exceptional sales growth. He has worked in companies both large and small including experience with start-up companies. 
"Mike is an outstanding addition to our team, as he brings a rich blend of sales and marketing expertise," said Gary Simon, CEO of Acumentrics. "We have a great product portfolio and several dozen customers, with sales this year doubling the last. Mike will propel our growth to new heights." 
Mr. Gagnon received his Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering from Worcester Polytechnic Institute and his Masters of Business Administration in Marketing from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. 
About Acumentrics 
Acumentrics SOFC Corporation, headquartered in Westwood, Massachusetts, develops and manufactures a line of clean, reliable electric power generators with DC or AC outputs up to 10kW. These electrical power generators apply a proprietary tubular, ceramics-based fuel cell technology to serve remote, off grid and military applications. Acumentrics generators efficiently convert commonly available propane, natural gas or liquid fuels directly to electricity without combustion. 
For more information, contact Norman Bessette at 1-781-461-8251 x 407 or nbessette@acumentrics.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151019005054/en/ Copyright Â© Business Wire 2015
